title: Riot patching bug has persisted please respond
body:
Dear riot, you take days to respond to a ticket i kid you not. anyways.
ISSUE: unkown error and then download patch starts from the begginning and continues in a loop.
ERROR: unkown error please see logs.
PC: windows 7, no firewalls
Location: D drive under games.
START DATE: since i was given the option to download beta client almost 2 weeks ago.
Resolve: not resolved.
Work around: Getting a friend to download the patch on his pc and copying the game over to my pc.

NOTE: this issue is persisting into patch 6.23.

Please respond to me via email, because you have the admin right to look up my profile and see my email.
Remote to my pc if you have to, to get more details on your error and how to fix it.

Also not the only one with this patching bug. I have made 2 posts about it last week, where i recieved allot of responses of people with the exact same issue.
look forward to your reply.

replies.body:
What percent are you receiving the error exactly?  What happens if you try to patch through the legacy client:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

Let me know, I'm happy to help!
